divs: sighting detailsif you have tivo, you might want to re-watch the opening of todays rose bowl. rose bowl today 01\01\2009, right as the stealth bomber was getting ready to do the fly-by, there are 2 white objects in the sky, in the upper left of the screen. just as the stealth flies over, one of the objects jets to the left & leaves a trail. i have hdtv so i can see a lot of detail. i will be watch this game like a hawk!
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
